name: T-Me Studios
description:
T-Me Studios is a Romanian App Development agency founded in 2013. Timmy is their in-house platform built for app creation, management and automation. The company built it because after looking around, nobody was offering something like Timmy. Timmy can create 5000 new APKs faster than anybody else. It can handle the app creation and itâ€™s smart enough to create a template from any app, so it can instantly reskin it with endless types of interfaces.
An artist can create a totally new app from scratch.
